parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Triggers </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Waypoints </value></part><part><name>GROUP2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Defines the title effect via [Type, Effect, Text] where

'Type' can be 
*"NONE", 
*"OBJECT", 
**'Text' defines the shown object , a subclass of CfgTitles.

*"RES" 
**'Text' defines a resource class, a subclass of RscTitles.
*"TEXT"
**The 'Text' is shown as text itself. 'Effect' defines a subtype: "PLAIN", "PLAIN DOWN", "BLACK", "BLACK FADED", "BLACK OUT", "BLACK IN", "WHITE OUT" or "WHITE IN".  </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> trigger '''setTitleEffect''' [type, effect, text] </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> trigger: [[Object]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> [type, effect, text]: [[Array]] of strings. See above  </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> waypoint '''setTitleEffect''' [type, effect, text] </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> waypoint: [[Array]] - format [[Waypoint]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER21</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> [type, effect, text]: [[Array]] of strings. See above  </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER22</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <ext><name>pre</name><attr/><inner>_trigger setTitleEffect ["TEXT", "PLAIN DOWN", "Hello world."]</inner><close></pre></close></ext> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[createTrigger]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part></template>
